incident_updates.body:
• 2012-08-16 05:42:33 - We've identified and resolved the cause for the failure during the database maintenance window and are proceeding with the planned database maintenance.
  • 2012-08-16 06:01:50 - The new database cluster is in place and services are beginning to come back up.
  • 2012-08-16 06:16:20 - Response times for github.com are still improving as we fix broken Unicorns. Services are available, but a little slow at the moment. Processing for queued jobs is currently disabled.
  • 2012-08-16 06:21:17 - We've re-enabled processing for queued jobs. The backlog from the maintenance window is currently being worked through.
  • 2012-08-16 06:41:07 - We've processed a bit over half of the queued jobs from the maintenance. Response time has improved significantly and is continuing to decrease.
  • 2012-08-16 06:56:26 - App response times are now completely back to normal. All job queues should be caught up except for search index updates.
  • 2012-08-16 07:12:20 - All systems normal!
